subject: Football
Masks
Helmets
organizations: National Operating Committee on Standards for Athletic Equipment
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. has cracked down on the fierce and funky face masks some players attached to their helmets, unless players prove a medical reason for them.
snippet: The N.F.L. has cracked down on the fierce and funky face masks some players attached to their helmets, unless players prove a medical reason for them.
